H0.text: who owned the colts when they left baltimore. Robert Kraft

H1.text: who owned the colts when they left baltimore. Art Modell

H2.text: who owned the colts when they left baltimore. Jerry Jones

H3.text: who owned the colts when they left baltimore. Irsay

A4.text: Irsay assumed ownership of the Baltimore Colts on July 13, 1972, after acquiring the Los Angeles Rams from the estate of Dan Reeves and swapping franchises with Carroll Rosenbloom.

A5.text: Irsay accepted a deal offered by the city of Indianapolis, leading to the Colts' relocation to Indianapolis on March 29, 1984.
